```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
dt <- combined_data_set %>% 
  filter(Sex == 'Male' & Year == '2016') %>% 
  group_by(Region) %>% 
  mutate(RegionCount = n())


  ggplot(dt,aes(x = HappinessRank, y = SuicidePer100000, color = Region))+
    geom_point()+
    stat_ellipse(data= filter(dt, RegionCount >= 30), mapping = aes(x = HappinessRank, 
                                                                    y = SuicidePer100000, 
                                                                    color = Region))
  
```
